title.rendered: “IDF Strikes: Combat Planes Target Hezbollah’s Military Bases in South Lebanon – A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Combat planes attacked Hezbollah terror organization’s military buildings and commands in South Lebanon.

A short time ago, combat planes attacked several terror targets of the Hezbollah terror organization in Lebanese territory.
Among the targets attacked were military buildings in the area of Aita al-Shaab, where Hezbollah terrorists operated, military commands in the areas of Majdal Zun and Kafra, and a terror infrastructure in the region of Mahibb.

During the day, a number of launches were identified from Lebanese territory towards areas in the north of the country.
IDF forces attacked the sources of the fire.

Attached is footage from the attack: https://bit.ly/48HkzaQ.
